content:
Ennaathmaavine ninkal uyarthunnen Naatha! - Haale... Uhaa...
Neeyen sharanam lajji--kkaruthe njan.

Vairikal enne cholli pukazharuthe - Haale... Uhaa...
Lajjikkaruthe ninnaa-shritaraarum.

Doshikal naanikum paazppaniyil - Haale... Uhaa...
Naatha! Nin paathakal enne-kaattiduka.

Ariyikkanamenne nin cheruvazhikal - Haale... Uhaa...
Neril nayichenne parishii--lippikka.

Naravatsalane! - Jalanidhiyil
Nibi Yonaaye - veendavane!
Duritamaha jala nidhiyathil ni-
nnadiyaare veendi - nam.

Vaazhvetta Braaham--thathan than bhavanam
\tMoonnu pumaanmaaral
\tSaakshaala manavaalan Mashiha
\tSakkaay bhavanathe vaazhthi,
Swaaradhakare - riyaveettil - thrithwam vaanidename nal-
\tThalamaruyaa--ithu vaazhthappedanam.

Evangelionil--Moraan shishyarodaay
\tCholli ketten njan
\tKaikkolvoo ningale veede-
\tThaavi - tenne kaikkolvoo
Abrahaamin bhavanam pol - njangal ananjora bhavanathe
\tRakshakane!-vaazhthuka thrikkaiyaal.

Shoonyaaranyathil - nedi samthripti,
\tJanam anjappathaal
\tShreshthaa-chaaryanmar aarnno-
\tReege - hattheyum athinullil
Paarpporeyum Rakshakane!
Thrikkaiyaal vaazhthename nal
\tThalamurayaa - ithu vaazhthappedanam

E - liyaavinn aasheervaadathaal; vidhavaagehathil
\tKumbh - thil dhaanyappodiyum
\tKombil thailavum attila
Aa varam aarnneedatte nin--bhaktar ananjora bhavanam nal
\tThalamurayaa – lithu vaazhthappedanam.
Haleluyyaa--Uhaleluyyaa--Naatha! Nin velivum vishwaasa mathum nalkiidaname;  Saanthwanamaruli paavanagirishibirangalilekku nayicheedanamenne. Haleluyyaa.

Karthaave! Ninnaardhratha nirayum vaathil thurannee
Praarthana kettittaathmaakalil anpunndaakenam.

Goodham veettil praartthippathilaanudayonishtam
Shabdathaalallaarnnathu bhaagyam dharmmishtanmar

Saumyan mol praartthanamoolam bhaagichazhi
Kootam neengi, dushtan, Pharaon mungippoyi

Daavidin praartthana ketteesha nardhratha thonni
Paapam mochicheeki veendum pravachana shakthi.

Choolaykkullil Haananiyanmaar praartthichappol
Theekkundatheenavare daivam samrakshichu.

Niryaanam, nyaayathin peedham, narakam moonnum
Bheeyetteedunnen Karthaave! ennulathil
BhavanasuddhikaraNathinulla ThalippayaThteeruvaan ThakkaVanna Pithaavinteyum + Puthranthinteyum + Parishudhaathmaavinteyum + Naamaththil Ee Vellam Vaazhttappettittu Suddhikarikkappettirikkunnu.

Onnaayirikkunna Pithaavinteyum + Puthranthinteyum + Parishudharoohayudeyum + Naamaththil Jeevanullathum Jeevippikkunnathumaya Sleebaayude Adayaalaathaal Mudrakuthappettunna Ee Bhavanam Ennenkilum Anugrahikkappettu Veditthullaathaayithiratte.

Maathavum Shudhnmaarum
Arppikkum Madhyastathayaal
Vaazhvampoade Veedinnum
Veettaarkkum Naathaa! Nalku
(Thudarnnu Vishwaasapramaanavum Daivamaathavinteyum Parishudhnmaaryudeyum Kukkiliyoonnum Cholliyasheshaththum HooThomo)
